Title: Fundraiser
Writer: Armando Iannucci (teleplay), Simon Blackwell (teleplay), Armando Iannucci (story), Armando Iannucci (creator)
Actors: Julia Louis-Dreyfus, Anna Chlumsky, Tony Hale, Reid Scott
Plot: Vice President Selina Meyer and her staff - chief of staff Amy, spokesperson Mike, right-hand man Gary, and executive assistant Sue - are still finding their footing in Washington D.C. ...
